thread.title: A very nice extremely well located hotel with nice service
thread.title_full: A very nice extremely well located hotel with nice service - Review of Hotel Astra Opera - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: elenamoscow2017
title: A very nice extremely well located hotel with nice service
text: A very nice extremely well located hotel with nice service. Good breakfast, big rooms with comfy beds, great clean-up, daily snack free of charge is a nice touch. Just a perfect accommodation option for Paris.
